reviewText: This was the best one. It was realistic as opposed to the over sex crap the others brought including those awful remakes. This was the original and it was the characters themselves that freaked you out. Anyone who didn't like this film has no respect for true horror and just likes the chop chop pretty girl being raped drugs n all that useless distractions in movies.
Does not work in my region.
Product did not work but return was handled promptly.
The DVD wasn't for our region so it wouldn't play on our player.
It arrived cracked. This is the second Bluray I have purchased which arrived broken in a row. Completely disappointing.
Only for "regional B" I didn't even know there was such a thing!!!
